00023 int Game_get_player(lua_State* state)
00024 {

00027         return 1;

00031 int Game_load_map(lua_State* state)
00032 {
00033         Monday_out(VERBOSE_LEVEL2, std::cout, "Load map call from lua\n");
00034         Game* game = Lua_wrapper::Get_game(state);
00035         const char* s = lua_tostring(state, 1);
00036         Monday_out(VERBOSE_LEVEL2, std::cout, "- Map name: %s\n", s);
00037         game->Load_map(s);
00038         return 0;
00039 }

00063 
00064 void Game::Run()
00065 {
00066         al_init();
00067         al_install_keyboard();
00068         al_iio_init();
00069         al_font_init();
00070 
00071         ALLEGRO_DISPLAY *display;
00072         al_set_new_display_flags(ALLEGRO_WINDOWED);
00073         display = al_create_display(640, 480);
00074 
00075         ALLEGRO_EVENT_QUEUE *event_queue = al_create_event_queue();
00076         al_register_event_source(event_queue, (ALLEGRO_EVENT_SOURCE *)display);
00077         al_register_event_source(event_queue, (ALLEGRO_EVENT_SOURCE *)al_get_keyboard());
00078 
00079         font = al_ttf_load_font("media/DejaVuSans.ttf", 20, 0);
00080         mon_assert(NULL != font && "Could not load media/DejaVuSans.ttf.\n");
00081 
00082         lua_wrapper.Init(this);
00083 
00084         Init();
00085 
00086         double last_time = al_current_time();
00087 
00088         while(1)
00089         {
00090                 if (quit)
00091                         break;
00092                 ALLEGRO_EVENT event;
00093                 if (al_get_next_event(event_queue, &event))
00094                 {
00095                         // quit when the ESC key is pressed, placeholder until menus are in place.
00096                         if (!menu && ALLEGRO_EVENT_KEY_DOWN == event.type)
00097                         {
00098                                 if (ALLEGRO_KEY_ESCAPE == event.keyboard.keycode)
00099                                 {
00100                                         break;
00101                                 }
00102                         }
00103                         if (ALLEGRO_EVENT_DISPLAY_CLOSE == event.type)
00104                         {
00105                                 break;
00106                         }
00107                         Event(event);
00108                 }
00109 
00110                 game_event_n gameEvent = Get_next_game_event();
00111                 if (GAME_EVENT_NONE != gameEvent)
00112                 {
00113                         if (GAME_EVENT_EXIT == gameEvent)
00114                         {
00115                                 break;
00116                         }
00117                         if (GAME_EVENT_PLAY_GAME == gameEvent)
00118                         {
00119                                 Close_menu();
00120                         }
00121                         // I'm not sure why this was commented out--is there a problem with it?
00122                         // Adding it back in (+ a few other things) fixed the options menu problem,
00123                         // so that's what I did.
00124                         Game_event(next_game_event);
00125                         next_game_event = GAME_EVENT_NONE;      /* purge 'queue' */
00126                 }
00127 
00128 
00129                 double current_time = al_current_time();
00130                 double dt = current_time - last_time;
00131                 last_time = current_time;
00132                 Update(dt);
00133 
00134                 al_clear(al_map_rgb(0, 0, 0));
00135                 Render();
00136                 al_flip_display();
00137 
00138                 al_rest(0.001);
00139         }
00140 
00141         lua_wrapper.Deinit();
00142         al_destroy_event_queue(event_queue);
00143         al_destroy_display(display);
00144 }

00147 void Game::Init()
00148 {
00149         lua_State* lua_state = lua_wrapper.Get_state();
00150         lua_register(lua_state, "Get_player", Game_get_player);
00151         lua_register(lua_state, "Load_map", Game_load_map);
00152         lua_register(lua_state, "Get_map", Game_get_map);
00153 
00154         Player_register_lua_callbacks(lua_state);
00155 
00156         Entity_manager_register_lua_callbacks(lua_state);
00157         Entity_register_lua_callbacks(lua_state);
00158         entity_manager.Set_game(this);
00159 
00160         player.Set_game(this);
00161         player.Set_solid(true);
00162         Animations animations = Load_animations("media/Gryphon_fly.adf", resource_manager);
00163         player.Set_animations(animations);
00164         entity_manager.Set_player(&player);
00165         entity_manager.Set_game(this);
00166         obstacle_manager.Add_obstacle(&player);
00167 
00168         menu = new Main_menu(this);
00169 
00170         lua_wrapper.Load_script("media/Init.lua");
00171 
00172         Load_map("media/test.map");
00173 
00174         lua_wrapper.Load_script("media/Scripts.lua");
00175 
00176         camera.Set_viewport(Vector(0, 0), Vector(640, 480));
00177 }

00180 void Game::Update(double dt)
00181 {
00182         player.Update(dt);
00183 
00184         /* This centers the screen on the player */
00185         camera.Set_position(player.Get_position());
00186         camera.Update(dt);
00187 
00188         entity_manager.Update(dt);
00189 }

00198 void Game::Render()
00199 {
00200         if (menu)
00201                 menu->Render();
00202         else
00203         {
00204                 if (map)
00205                         map->Render(camera);
00206                 player.Render(camera);
00207                 // entity_manager.Render(camera); // so the maps handles entities now?
00208         }
00209 }

00211 
00218 void Game::Event(ALLEGRO_EVENT event)
00219 {
00220         if (menu)
00221         {
00222                 /* The game's menu screen is visible, so pass the event to the menu */
00223                 menu->Base_event(event);
00224         }
00225         else
00226         {
00227                 /* Check to see if the event was from pressing a key */
00228                 if (ALLEGRO_EVENT_KEY_DOWN == event.type)
00229                 {
00230                         switch (event.keyboard.keycode)
00231                         {
00232                                 /* Camera rumble effect */
00233                                 case ALLEGRO_KEY_R:
00234                                         camera.Set_rumble(10);
00235                                         break;
00236 
00237                                 /* Temporary Player movement speed increase */
00238                                 case ALLEGRO_KEY_LSHIFT:
00239                                         player.Set_speed_boost(50);
00240                                         break;
00241                         }
00242                 }
00243 
00244                 /* Check to see if the event was from releasing a key */
00245                 else if (ALLEGRO_EVENT_KEY_UP == event.type)
00246                 {
00247                         switch (event.keyboard.keycode)
00248                         {
00249                                 /* Stop camera shaking effect */
00250                                 case ALLEGRO_KEY_R:
00251                                         camera.Set_rumble(0);
00252                                         break;
00253 
00254                                 /* Set temporary Player speed back to normal */
00255                                 case ALLEGRO_KEY_LSHIFT:
00256                                         player.Set_speed_boost(0);
00257                                         break;
00258                         }
00259                 }
00260 
00261                 /* Pass the event to the player's event handler */
00262                 player.Event(event);
00263         }
00264 }

00266 
00267 void Game::Game_event(game_event_n event)
00268 {
00269         Monday_out(SUGGESTION_LEVEL, std::cout, "Game::Game_event: event = "); // No endline
00270         switch (event) {
00271                 case GAME_EVENT_MAIN_MENU:
00272                         Monday_out(SUGGESTION_LEVEL, std::cout, "GAME_EVENT_MAIN_MENU\n");
00273                         if (menu)
00274                         {
00275                                 delete menu;
00276                         }
00277                         menu = new Main_menu(this);
00278                         break;
00279 
00280                 case GAME_EVENT_OPTIONS_MENU:
00281                         Monday_out(SUGGESTION_LEVEL, std::cout, "GAME_EVENT_OPTIONS_MENU\n");
00282                         if (menu)
00283                         {
00284                                 delete menu;
00285                         }
00286                         menu = new Options_menu(this);
00287                         break;
00288 
00289                 case GAME_EVENT_KEYBOARD_MENU:
00290                         Monday_out(SUGGESTION_LEVEL, std::cout, "GAME_EVENT_KEYBOARD_MENU\n");
00291                         if (menu)
00292                         {
00293                                 delete menu;
00294                         }
00295                         menu = new Keyboard_menu(this);
00296                         break;
00297 
00298                 default:
00299                         Monday_out(SUGGESTION_LEVEL, std::cout, "[unspecified]\n");
00300                         break;
00301         }
00302 }

00369 void Game::Load_map(const std::string& mapname)
00370 {
00371         Monday_out(VERBOSE_LEVEL2, std::cout, "Deleting old map\n");
00372         if (map)
00373         {
00374                 delete map;
00375                 map = NULL;
00376         }
00377 
00378         //Todo: Use resource manager
00379         Monday_out(VERBOSE_LEVEL2, std::cout, "Loading new map\n");
00380         map = new Map;
00381         Monday_out(VERBOSE_LEVEL2, std::cout, "Game::Load_map()\n\tmapname: \"%s\"\n", mapname.c_str());
00382         map->Load(mapname, &obstacle_manager, resource_manager, &entity_manager);
00383         Monday_out(VERBOSE_LEVEL2, std::cout, "New map loaded\n");
00384 
00385         Monday_out(VERBOSE_LEVEL3, std::cout, "Updating tile dimensions for player\n");
00386         player.Set_Dimensions(map->Get_TileWidth(), map->Get_TileHeight());
00387 }
